title: 01/05/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/05/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to FS1's Nick Wright about Kyrie Irving and the role that he should have with his return to the Nets. We check in with the Browns. Why did the Browns decide Week 18 was the right time to pull the plug on Baker's season? And Hall of Fame Broadcaster Al Michaels shares stories from his time in the booth with the late John Madden.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Why did the Browns decide Week 18 was the right time to pull the plug on Baker's season? And Hall of Fame Broadcaster Al Michaels shares stories from his time in the booth with the late John Madden.
